name: Sweet Home (karabacak)
description:
Story

Our character is an agent. The character goes to space for a special mission. The special mission is to take the drunk aliens to their home. Some puzzles need to be solved to accomplish this task.

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys

Actions (Opening Door, Using computer) - press X or SPACE

Undo Last Input - press Z

Restart the Level - press R

How To Play

Use computer to learn your task.

Green alien sticks to you.

Purple and yellow alien is pushable.

Blue alien does what you do. Don’t make him contact with the purple, he is very dangerous.

Line up your astronaut suit properly to create your suit.

Other Information

 You can hack this game from here.
